category.name: Subscription Manager
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: SCM_notification_digest
preference.preference_description: Specifies the delivery of Subscription notifications as periodic digest collating notifications for daily and weekly Subscription respectively. This is not applicable to immediate notifications. Valid Values: *1 : Periodic Digest is disabled. This is the default value. *2 : Periodic Digest is enabled. Collated notifications are delivered.
